title: Alfonso Ribeiro and wife Angela support longtime friend Will Smith at Gemini Man premiere in LA
text:
Alfonso Ribeiro is always there for his friend Will Smith.

Ribeiro, 48, was snapped with his wife Angela on Sunday at the Los Angeles premiere of Smith's new motion picture Gemini Man at the TCL Chinese Theater.

The Bronx native donned a pinstriped blue suit over a plaid collared shirt with brown leather shoes at the debut of the sci-fi drama.

Happy in Hollywood: Alfonso Ribeiro, 48, was snapped with his wife Angela, 38, Sunday at the LA premiere of Will Smith's new motion picture Gemini Man at the TCL Chinese Theater in Hollywood

His spouse Angela, 38, was clad in a black pantsuit with a white top, with black heels and hoop earrings, and her blonde locks neatly parted and pulled back at the lavish event.

Ribeiro is father to daughter Sienna, 16, from a past relationship, and shares three children with Angela: sons Alfonso 'AJ' Lincoln, six, Anders Reyn, four, and daughter Ava Sue, five months.

'There's a lot of love in our house,' the entertainment veteran told People last month, adding that Ava is 'a really happy baby' and 'just smiles and connects all the time.'

Ribeiro added: 'She's got two crazy older brothers that love her. She's just a little sweetheart.'

Stunning: Angela, 38, was clad in a black pantsuit with a white top, with black heels and hoop earrings

Romantic: The couple celebrate their seven-year anniversary later this month

Do the Carlton: Ribeiro emerged victorious on Dancing with the Stars in 2014

Ribeiro, who hosts America's Funniest Home Videos, told the magazine that his son Anders is the 'complete daredevil' of the family whose antics would be a perfect fit for the long-running ABC series.

'When I say kids are crawling up the walls, he literally crawls up the wall,' said Ribeiro. 'He'll do things that AJ won't even consider doing. He's the one who would end up on our show if we had the cameras rolling.'

Show biz stalwart: Ribeiro currently hosts America's Funniest Home Videos on ABC

Dapper: The Bronx native donned a pinstriped blue suit over a plaid collared shirt with brown leather shoes at the debut of the sci-fi drama

Pals: Ribeiro worked alongside Smith playing Carlton Banks on The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air for its six-year run, and the pair have remained close ever since

Cousins on screen: Ribeiro and Smith showed in character as Carlton Banks and Will Smith on The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air

Ribeiro worked alongside Smith playing Carlton Banks on The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air for its six-year run, and the pair have remained close ever since, with Ribeiro frequently supporting Smith at his premieres.

Smith in the film portrays a veteran hitman who's battling a clone of his younger self.

Gemini Man opens in theaters October 11; America's Funniest Home Videos airs on ABC Sundays at 7/6c.
